author: jm
msg: Added some more test rules that seem good against the "DFKGJDFGJ, the blah etc"

author: duncf
msg: Updated sa-stats.pl from Bob Apthorpe (Bug 2870) Also included a hack
to fix Parse::Syslog brokenness and allow the script to work with log
files not in current year. (I.e. after new years)

author: mss
msg: Add SVN files .r[0-9] and .mine to list of ignored files, remove obsolete windows_install.

author: duncf

Also, fixes Subject tagging to allow for all tags to be used, noting
